description: Development of a Blazor WASM web application for real-time crop analysis with â€‹AI-enabled cartography. Design System Lead and main developer. Creation of wireframes, prototypes and workflows and front-end integration of the application.

.NET full-stack web developer for an application for managing connected scientific equipment on an Azure platform. Design and integration of the front-end. Development of APIs and data management/storage via Azure Cosmos DB.

WPF software developer for scientific measurement instruments in a Agile Scrum team: design and integration of the user interface, implementation of scientific algorithms, development of unit tests and automatic regression tests.

Development of a .NET application communicating with Node JS micro-services for the booking of train tickets for a French railway company in a Agile Scrum team. Responsible for the implementation of the automated integration tests. CMS customer support.

Development of combined X-ray characterization technique and software (Python), optimization of measurement and analysis protocols, characterization of components of technological interest (RAM, PV, MOS). Created of a collaboration group with European laboratories. Performed installation of experimental setup, conformity tests, operational support and results analysis.
